title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST-style API and a CLI to pull, create, and run models like Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, usable in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and create models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate.

title: ollama-cli-csharp
summary: Community-built C# CLI and library for Ollama with interactive chat.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, Docker Compose stacks, GPU tweaks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for quick local or cloud deployment.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and create models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configures Ollama4j client for Java microservices.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into guild chats.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama inside your notes.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama chat and code-completion side panel.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm package page for the official Ollama JavaScript client.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI package page for the official Ollama Python client.
